title: unesco_heritage_Gochang,_Hwasun_and_Ganghwa_Dolmen_Sites
text:
Name: Gochang, Hwasun and Ganghwa Dolmen Sites. short_description:

The prehistoric cemeteries at Gochang, Hwasun, and Ganghwa contain many hundreds of examples of dolmens - tombs from the 1st millennium BC constructed of large stone slabs. They form part of the Megalithic culture, found in many parts of the world, but nowhere in such a concentrated form.

. date_inscribed: 2000. danger: 0. date_end: . longitude: 126.92917. latitude: 34.96667. area_hectares: 51.65. category_long: Cultural. category_short: C. Country name: Republic of Korea. Region: Asia and the Pacific. iso_code: kr. transboundary: 0. rev_bis: .
